title: Coordinate Closing with Escrow
description: A transaction is clear to close. The agent needs to coordinate the final signing appointment with the escrow officer and the client.

tasks.description: Retrieve the transaction details, including the client's and escrow officer's contact information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all necessary contact info.

tasks.description: Contact the escrow officer to confirm they are ready and to get available signing times.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates with escrow to get scheduling options.

tasks.description: Coordinate with the client to select a time and confirm the final appointment with all parties.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the closing appointment.
